column4: whenever I try to check my repositories in Synaptic, it tells me they've changed and I must hit reload, after I hit reload and then it updates and I try to view/edit my repositories, it does the same thing, and I can't do it.
What do you mean paste my sources.list somewhere?
your problem seems to be something is /etc/apt/sources.list  . paste its content in pastebin for us to see
